sentences.sentence: Arch Devils are the most powerful creature of the Infernos.
sentences.translation: 大恶魔是地狱里最强大的生物。

sentences.sentence: I've heard the residents of the Infernos will summon a Diety of Fire to honor any hero who brings them the Grail.
sentences.translation: 我听说地狱的居民会召唤烈火守护神来纪念为他们带来圣杯的英雄。

sentences.sentence: The fire raging at Universal Studios in Los Angeles rivalled infernos seen in many of the films produced at the world-famous venue.
sentences.translation: 火灾肆虐于洛杉矶的环球影城，很多世界著名的电影制作场地都起火。
